sections.description:
TrelloFix makes it simple to capture annotated screenshots, add feedback notes, and send them directly to Trello.

This plugin helps agencies, developers, and QA teams streamline bug reporting without leaving WordPress. Save hours of back-and-forth and ensure every issue is clear and actionable.
sections.faq:
How does TrelloFix work?

Simply activate the plugin, connect it with Trello, and your team can capture and send feedback directly from WordPress.

Do I need a Trello account?

Yes. TrelloFix integrates directly into your existing Trello boards and lists.
sections.screenshots:
1. Feedback button inside WordPress.
  2. Capture annotated screenshots with one click.
  3. Issues instantly appear in Trello with details and screenshots.
